title: Commission Regulation (EEC) No 486/84 of 24 February 1984 re-establishing the levying of customs duties on certain made up textile articles, products of category 112 (code 1120) originating in Pakistan, to which the preferential tariff arrangements set out in Council Regulation (EEC) No 3570/83 apply
header:
COMMISSION  REGULATION (EEC) No 486/84
of 24 February 1984
re-establishing the levying of customs duties on certain made up textile articles, products of category 112 (code 1120) originating in Pakistan, to which the preferential tariff arrangements set out in Council Regulation (EEC) No 3570/83 apply
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN
COMMUNITIES
main_body:
As from 28 February 1984 the levying of customs duties, suspended pursuant to Council Regulation (EEC) No 3570/83, shall be re-established in respect of the following products, imported into the Community and originating in Pakistan:
1.2.3.4.5 //   //   //   //   //   // Code  // Category  // CCT heading No  // NIMEXE code (1984)  // Description  //  //   //   //   //   //   // (1)  // (2)  // (3)  // (4)  //  //   //   //   //   // 1120  // 112  // ex 62.05  //  // Other made up textile articles (including dress patterns):  //   //   //   // 62.05-10, 30, 93, 95, 99  // Other made up textile articles, woven, excluding those of categories 113 and 114  //   //   //   //   //

This Regulation shall enter into force on the third day following its publication in the Official Journal of the European Communities.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 24 February 1984.
For the Commission
Karl-Heinz NARJES
Member of the Commission
(1) OJ No L 362, 24. 12. 1983, p. 92.
